Text: I am waiting for Heimat 2 and Heimat 3. I have been looking for Heimat 2 for fifteen years, since it aired on swedish television. It is perhaps the best thing I have ever seen. For the love of God, If you can seed those, please do. It would be a blessing....

Thanks for a super-nice upload! :---------)
I've waited  for 17 years top see Heimat again..... Hope you'll upload the other parts aswell. Thanks again!!
Yes, thanks for the Heimat 1 series. And if it's possible for you to upload Heimat 2 as well, it'll be very appreciated.
Heimat 2 will be up in a a few days...Busy with Columbo..old promise from me...If seeders will help, can start middle this week...follow up with Heimat 3 and then the rest of Fassbinder..Ok ?
